Brazil‚Äôs Lucas Pinheiro Braathen has entered uncharted territory. The skier captured gold in the Olympic men‚Äôs giant slalom on Saturday, making him the first South American in history to win a Winter Games medal. Pinheiro Braathen‚Äôs mother is Brazilian and his father is Norwegian.
